item.title: Texas flooding live updates: Search continues for missing with 130 confirmed deaths
item.description: More than 130 people are dead after devastating flooding in the Texas Hill Country that began early on the Fourth of July.

item.title: Russia launches 136 drones into Ukraine ahead of expected Trump announcement
item.description: Russia launched four missiles and 136 drones into Ukraine overnight into Monday morning, according to Ukraine's air force.

item.title: China's exports jump 5.8% in June as tariffs reprieve prompts a rush of orders
item.description: China has reported its exports accelerated in June as a reprieve on U.S. tariffs prompted a rush of orders by companies and consumers

item.title: WATCH: Colorado grandmother crawls 14 hours to survive after injury in remote area
item.description: Linsey Davis reports on the remarkable survival story of a 75-year-old grandmother from Colorado, who crawled for 14 hours to seek safety after fallin...

item.title: WATCH: Hundreds of cats, dogs rescued amid deadly Texas floods with help from volunteers
